item.title: Why tests matter?
item.description: Why tests matter? Lately I have been studying cryptography and one of it’s foundations are Caesar's cipher. Introduction to Caesar’s cipher The idea is that you have a shift from 0 to 25, who as the name suggest, shift each letter it’s value, for example, a shift of 3 would output something like: Plaintext: THE QUICK BROWN FOX JUMPS OVER THE LAZY DOG Ciphertext: QEB NRFZH YOLTK CLU GRJMP LSBO QEB IXWV ALD So it means that to communicate using this cipher, you would receive the message and the shift used to encrypt, so you can decrypt the message.
